document.full_text: standard & poor's on tuesday said it downgraded greece's credit rating deeper into junk status on expectations the nation will have to borrow under emergency european stability plans.
document.title: s&p downgrades greece rating, says may cut again
lines_and_colors: standard & poor's on tuesday said it downgraded greece's credit rating deeper into junk status on expectations the nation will have to borrow under emergency european stability plans.
